DOC.brief_summary: A randomized trial comparing radiotherapy with supportive care in patients aged 70 years or older with newly diagnosed, histologically confirmed anaplastic astrocytoma or glioblastoma, and a Karnofsky performance status > 70.
DOC.brief_title: Radiotherapy for Malignant Astrocytomas in the Elderly
DOC.criteria: Glioblastoma and anaplastic astrocytoma, supratentorial, histologically confirmed Brain CT scan or MRI within 28 days before surgery Age: 70 years or older Karnofsky performance status, 70 or more. Life expectancy over 12 weeks Informed consent Brain radiotherapy Chemotherapy Severe systemic disease
